verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> Yahweh <WH3050> from the heavens! <WH8064> Praise <WH1984> him in the heights! <WH4791>
Praise <WH1984> him, <WH4397> all his angels! Praise <WH1984> him, <WH6635> all his army!
Praise <WH1984> him, <WH8121> sun and moon! <WH3394> Praise <WH1984> him, <WH216> all you shining stars! <WH3556>
Praise <WH1984> him, <WH8064> you heavens of heavens, <WH8064> You waters <WH4325> that are above the heavens. <WH8064>
Let them praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> For he commanded, <WH6680> and they were created. <WH1254>
He has also established <WH5975> them forever <WH5703> and ever. <WH5703> He has made <WH5414> a decree <WH2706> which will not pass away. <WH5674>
Praise <WH1984> Yahweh <WH3068> from the earth, <WH776> you great sea creatures, <WH8577> and all depths! <WH8415>
Lightning <WH784> and hail, <WH1259> snow <WH7950> and clouds; <WH7008> stormy <WH5591> wind, <WH7307> fulfilling <WH6213> his word; <WH1697>
mountains <WH2022> and all hills; <WH1389> fruit <WH6529> trees <WH6086> and all cedars; <WH730>
wild animals <WH2416> and all livestock; <WH929> small creatures <WH7431> and flying <WH3671> birds; <WH6833>
kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> and all peoples; <WH3816> princes <WH8269> and all judges <WH8199> of the earth; <WH776>
both young men <WH970> and maidens; <WH1330> old men <WH2205> and children: <WH2205>
let them praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> for his name <WH8034> alone is exalted. <WH7682> His glory <WH1935> is above the earth <WH776> and the heavens. <WH8064>

He has lifted <WH7311> up the horn <WH7161> of his people, <WH5971> the praise <WH8416> of all his saints; <WH2623> even of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> a people <WH5971> near <WH7138> to him. <WH1984> Praise Yah! <WH3050>
